resources.string: MentorMe is an app to help you find the right mentor to help you grow. Mass education leaves people behind, and apprenticeship doesn\'t scale. We believe mentorship is the happy medium that can help the most people acquire the most skills in the most effective way. We\'re glad you\'re here to join us!
Want to be both a mentor and mentee? Don\'t worry! You can do both. Just pick one first.
I want to teach others my skills!
I want to build a new skill!
